description: Hikers are rare but solitude isn't on this 9-mile ridgeline hike to a secluded lakeside campsite in the Alpine Lakes Wilderness.
directions: I-5 N to WA 520 E to I-405 N to WA 522 E to US 2 E/Stevens Pass Hwy. In 36 mi., R onto Foss River Rd. (becomes FS 68). In 3.5 mi., bear L @ Y onto FS 6830. In 6.7 mi., R @ Y onto Spur Rd. 310. Go 1.3 mi. to parking.
title: Fisher Lake via Tonga Ridge
